com.vmware.vapi.std.activation.impl

Class ActivationManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.activation.ActivationMonitor
      • com.vmware.vapi.std.activation.impl.ActivationManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, com.vmware.vapi.internal.std.activation.impl.ActivationRegistry, ActivationManagerProvider, ActivationManagerTypes

    public class ActivationManagerImpl
extends ActivationMonitor
implements ActivationManagerProvider, com.vmware.vapi.internal.std.activation.impl.ActivationRegistry
    WARNING: Use only as a sample. The API is experimental and subject to change in future versions.

    In memory registry for activations. It is both an implementation of an activation manager service (used by clients to cancel method invocations) and a ActivationMonitor (used by service implementations to check for their own cancellation status). It requires an ActivationFilter to be deployed.

    Thread-safety: the implementation is thread-safe.

      • cancel

        public void cancel(String activationId,
          AsyncContext<Void> asyncContext)
        Description copied from interface: ActivationManagerProvider
        Asks for cancellation of a running activation. Whether or not the cancellation request will have any effect depends on the implementation of the method that has to be canceled.

        Operation Errors:
        NotFound - there is no activation with the specified id

        Specified by:
        cancel in interface ActivationManagerProvider
        Parameters:
        activationId - activation identifier
        asyncContext - Handle to report the progress, result or error of the operation invocation.
